title: Google Chrome security advisory (AV25-385)
description: On June 30, 2025, Google published a security advisory to address a vulnerability in the following products:
products: Stable Channel Chrome for Desktop  versions prior to 138.0.7204.96/97 (Windows), 138.0.7204.92/93 (Mac), and 138.0.7204.92 (Linux)
solution: Review the references and apply the necessary updates.
